action-view.name: product.root.product
action-view.title: All products
action-view.domain: self.endDate IS NULL or CURRENT_DATE < self.endDate

action-view.name: product.root.filters.obsoleteproducts
action-view.title: All obsolete products
action-view.domain: self.endDate IS NOT NULL and CURRENT_DATE > self.endDate

action-view.name: invoice.root.sales.filters.unpaiddueinvoice
action-view.title: Unpaid due invoices
action-view.domain: self.operationTypeSelect = 3 and CURRENT_DATE > self.dueDate and self.inTaxTotalRemaining > 0

action-view.name: invoice.root.purchases.filters.unpaiddueinvoice
action-view.title: Unpaid due invoices
action-view.domain: self.operationTypeSelect = 1 and CURRENT_DATE > self.dueDate and self.inTaxTotalRemaining > 0

action-view.title: Les règles de calculs des taxes
